name: Fragments (itch) (Qazhax)
description:
A visual novel about a day (or two) in the life of Chris, depicting the wavy ups and downs that define his future. A very bizarre approach to the common visual novel style, affected heavily by the overall theme - Waves.

The game was created for global game jam 2017 in 48 hours. It is open source under creative commons. For more information check http://globalgamejam.org/2017/games/fragments.

Contains 3,280 words of pure wavy awesomeness with an expected length of about ten minutes.
